Module org.cojen.tupl
Package org.cojen.tupl.repl

Interface DatabaseReplicator

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable, ReplicationManager, Replicator
public interface DatabaseReplicator
extends Replicator, ReplicationManager
Implementation of a ReplicationManager for supporting full database replication. Applications shouldn't interact with a DatabaseReplicator instance directly — only the database instance is permitted to interact with it. The recommended way of enabling replication is by passing a ReplicatorConfig object to the DatabaseConfig.replicate method.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cojen.tupl.ext.ReplicationManager

  • Method Details

    • open

      static DatabaseReplicator open​(ReplicatorConfig config) throws IOException
      Open a replicator instance, creating it if necessary. Pass the instance to the DatabaseConfig object before opening the database.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if misconfigured
      IOException
